uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.gui
Class DisplayPhylogeny

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.gui.DisplayPhylogeny

public class DisplayPhylogeny
extends java.lang.Object

A class to hold data and display information about phylogenies, which can be specified as either TreeNode or NewickTreeRepresentation

Author:
Joe Parker, Kitson Consulting / Queen Mary University of London

expandTaxonNameSet

public java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> expandTaxonNameSet(java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> treeSet)
                                                       throws java.lang.NullPointerException
Compares a HashSet of taxa against the String[] of taxa present in this DisplayPhylogeny. Any new taxa are added to the set and the set is returned.

Parameters:
treeSet -
Returns:
originalNameSet with any unseen taxa present in the DisplayPhylogeny added...
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException
